title: Error in rank promotion
body:
I won twice in a rank and after riot shut down rank cos of error 
my pt went down to 95pt what is wrong with riot seriously
this is not first time last time i didn't even get pt when i won it just said error

replies.body:
Hi Byeul

That sucks to hear you've had this issue.   Thanks for letting us know about it.

We actually had some problems with our Ranked system yesterday that caused this, and you can [read about them here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/dbkjXlyL-known-issue-ranked-lp-gains-not-correct).

Keep at it and I'm sure you'll get there! :)

Cheers
Mindstar
